thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice
thread.title_full: Very nice - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cakelady54
title: Very nice
text: I was in NYC briefly and stayed at the Roger because of its proximity to my work there. The decor had been upgraded since I last stayed there several years ago and it was soothing and relaxing. The feather pillows were a great plus in my book! Bed comfy. My only complaint, if you can call it that, was the lack of counter space in bathroom, but it was a typical NYC hotel bath, compact!
